name: Sports Cube Blast
description:
Cube smashing has never seen this theme before! That's right this game mixing the block smashing gameplay you all know and love with the sports that you also love. Break cubes by tapping on them. Get the required items to move on to the next level & continue the Sports Cube Blast saga!

Features:
• Lots of levels
• Beautiful effects
• Sports!
• Booster sport items
• Many different puzzles
• New & exciting, never before seen theme!
• Free to play
